org.mmbase.module.builders

Interface ImagesInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImages, ImageCaches, Images, ImageSources

    public interface ImagesInterface
    Builders with want to use the ImageCaches 'icaches' builders, need to implement this interface
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.2
    Version:
    $Id: AbstractImages.java 35615 2009-06-03 13:20:55Z michiel $
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
